Title: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority, in conjunction with the New York city transit authority, to develop certain tickets
Summary: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority, in conjunction with the New York city transit authority, to develop weekly and monthly tickets valid for optional, discounted transfers between such authorities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to tickets purchased for the Long Island Rail Road and the Metro-North Commuter Railroad Company
